title: Check if Absolute URL
description: In this lab, we will dive into the world of JavaScript programming and explore various concepts such as variables, data types, conditional statements, loops, and functions. Through a series of hands-on exercises and coding challenges, you will learn how to write clean and efficient JavaScript code, and gain a solid understanding of the fundamental principles that underpin this powerful programming language. By the end of this lab, you will be equipped with the skills and knowledge needed to tackle more complex JavaScript projects with confidence.

meta.title: JavaScript Programming Fundamentals | Coding Exercises
meta.description: Dive into the world of JavaScript programming and explore concepts like variables, data types, conditional statements, loops, and functions. Hands-on exercises and coding challenges to build a solid understanding of JavaScript.
meta.keywords: JavaScript, Programming, Fundamentals, Variables, Data Types, Conditional Statements, Loops, Functions

verify.name: Verify Node Usage In Zsh History
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.

i18n.title: 检查是否为绝对URL
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将深入探索JavaScript编程的世界，探讨各种概念，如变量、数据类型、条件语句、循环和函数。通过一系列实践练习和编码挑战，你将学习如何编写简洁高效的JavaScript代码，并深入理解支撑这一强大编程语言的基本原理。在本实验结束时，你将具备自信应对更复杂JavaScript项目所需的技能和知识。

meta.title: JavaScript编程基础 | 编码练习
meta.description: 深入探索JavaScript编程世界，探讨变量、数据类型、条件语句、循环和函数等概念。通过实践练习和编码挑战，扎实理解JavaScript。
meta.keywords: JavaScript, 编程, 基础, 变量, 数据类型, 条件语句, 循环, 函数

verify.name: 验证Zsh历史记录中是否使用了Node
verify.hint: 通过输入'node'并按回车键，可以在终端/SSH中运行JavaScript。
